Niamh.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Níamh Cínn-Óir,
banphrionsa Tír na nÓg,
a chara
Niamh.eng0:
Black Molly:
Níamh Cínn-Óir,
princess of Tír na nÓg,
 o friend
Niamh.gae1:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
Mallaidh Dubh, abair liom, 
 cad atá cearr?
Niamh.eng1:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
Black Molly, tell me, 
 what is wrong?
Niamh.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
Droch thuaras na draoithe
Niamh.eng2:
Black Molly: 
A bad omen of the druids
Niamh.gae3:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
 Drochrath? Éadóchas?
Ainmnaigh áɼ naimhead.
Niamh.eng3:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
 Doom? Despair? 
Name our enemy.
Niamh.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Ironkey a thugan sé ar féin.
Lord, a glaonn slúite ar.
Niamh.eng4:
Black Molly: 
'Ironkey, he calls himself. 
Legions call him Lord.
Niamh.gae5:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
Chasfaidh mise ar. Ach ar dtús
 an cosaint.
Niamh.eng5:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
I will face him myself.
But first, the defence.

Douglas_Hyde.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
A Dhuibhghlas, 
Laoch na hÉireann, 
tagaim le drochscéal.
Douglas_Hyde.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Douglas, Hero of Ireland, 
I come bearing dire tidings.
Douglas_Hyde.gae1:
Douglas Hyde: 
Mallaidh Dubh, tá tú ar ais 
ón domhan thíos ar deireadh! 
Cén imní atá ort?
Douglas_Hyde.eng1:
Douglas Hyde: 
Black Molly, you have returned 
from the underlands at last! What troubles you?
Douglas_Hyde.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Imní go deimhin, a Dhuibhghlas.
 Tá Ironkey, lena mheaisíní, 
ag máirseáil ar ríocht na Sióga.
Douglas_Hyde.eng2:
Black Molly: 
Trouble indeed, Douglas. 
Lord Ironkey, with his machines, 
marches on the Fairy Underworld.
Douglas_Hyde.gae3:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ironkey? 
Tá súile leagtha ag an créatúr sin 
ar Tír na nÓg?
Douglas_Hyde.eng3:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ironkey? That creature has set his sights 
on Tír na nÓg?
Douglas_Hyde.gae5:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ní mór dúinn glaoch
 ar laochra na hÉireann 
chun tacú linn.
Douglas_Hyde.eng5:
Douglas Hyde: 
We must rally 
the champions of Ireland.

Oisin.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Tá Tír na nÓg faoi ionsaí!
Oisin.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Tír na nóg is under attack!
Oisin.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Tá dul chun cinn gan staonadh, 
ag Tiarna Ironkey agus a meaisíní 
ifrinniúla.
Oisin.eng2:
Black Molly: 
Lord Ironkey advances relentlessly
 with his infernal machines.
Oisin.gae5:
Oisín: 
Cruinnímís 
laochra na hÉireann 
chun ár thaobh.
Oisin.eng5:
Oisín:
Let us rally 
the champions of Ireland 
to our side.

Sirriam.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Alexander ar deireadh! 
Táim fillte ón gcath thíos.
Sirriam.eng0:
Black Molly:
Alexander at last! 
I have returned from the battle below.
Sirriam.gae1:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Agus cén scéal  atá agat, 
ón gcogadh i gcoinne Ironkey?
Sirriam.eng1:
Alexander Nicolson: 
And what news have you 
from the war against Ironkey?
Sirriam.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Déanann a chuid meaisíní 
agus arrachtaigh 
na ríochtaí níos ísle a chreachadh.
Sirriam.eng2:
Black Molly: 
His machines and monsters ravage the lower kingdoms.
Sirriam.gae3:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Níl neart go chuir le chéile.
Glaofaidh muid 
ar forsaí na Gael
Sirriam.eng3:
Alexander Nicolson: 
There is no strength without unity. 
Let us muster the Gael.
Sirriam.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Ach cé ina measc 
a fhreagróidh ár nglaoch?
Sirriam.eng4:
Black Molly: 
But who among them 
will answer our call?
Sirriam.eng5:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Come.
We shall see.

Mug_Ruith.gae1:
Mug Ruith:
Mallaidh Dubh, 
bhraithim do láithreacht.
Mug_Ruith.eng1:
Mug Ruith:
Black Molly, 
I sense your presence.
Mug_Ruith.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A saoi, 
tá eagla orm nach feidir
Tír na nÓg galánta seasamh
i gcoinne acmhainn cogaíochta Ironkey.
Mug_Ruith.eng2:
Black Molly:
O wise one
I fear gallant Tír na nÓg 
can't stand 
against Ironkey's war capacity.
Mug_Ruith.gae3:
Mug Ruith:
Go deimhin, Ach ná bíodh eagla ort, 
tiochfaidh ár comhghuaillithe 
i gcabhair orainn.
Mug_Ruith.eng3:
Mug Ruith:
Indeed. 
But fear not, 
our allies will stand with us.
Mug_Ruith.gae5:
Mug Ruith:
Tá ár nasc domhain. 
Is féidir le cú amháin slua a gairm. 
Lig dúinn ár cú a roghnú...
Mug_Ruith.eng5:
Mug Ruith:
Our bond is deep. 
One hound- can summon a host. 
Let us choose our champion...

Abhartach.gae1:
Abhartach: 
A Mallaidh Dubh, 
nach milis d'eagla. 
Cad a spreag thú 
chun cúnamh a lorg uaimse?
Abhartach.eng1:
Abhartach: 
Black Molly, 
your fear is a sweet nectar. 
What has led you 
to seek the aid of one such as I?
Abhartach.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
A Thaoiseach na dorchadais, 
tá Ironkey, lena meaisíní agus arrachtaigh, 
ag máirseáil i leith le huacht cearnóir.
Abhartach.eng2:
Black Molly: 
O Chieftain of darknesses, 
Ironkey, with his machines and monsters, 
marchs hither with the will of a conqueror.
Abhartach.eng3:
Abhartach: 
Ironkey! 
A formidable foe indeed!
Abhartach.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh:
conas is féidir linn 
a ionsaí a sheasamh?
Abhartach.eng4:
Black Molly: 
How we may withstand 
his onslaught?
Abhartach.gae5:
Abhartach: 
Libh féin, ní féidir. 
Cruinnigh laochra na hÉireann 
ar shon na cúise.
Abhartach.eng5:
Abhartach: Alone, you cannot. 
Call upon the champions of Ireland 
to the cause.

Fionn.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
An feidir cúnamh a lorg 
ó laochra na hÉireann?
Fionn.eng2:
Black Molly:
Can we seek help from the champions
 of Ireland?

Pooka.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
Iolchrothach aosta
an bhfuil tú ann?
Pooka.eng0:
Black Molly:
ancient shapeshifter 
are you there?
Pooka.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
Tá na hísealríocht claoidhte.
Pooka.eng2:
Black Molly:
The lowerkingdoms have fallen.
Pooka.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh:
Cad é sin?  Tá laochra na hÉireann sa tobair?
Pooka.eng4: Black Molly: What's that? The champions of Ireland are in the well?

Fand.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Aigéan aidhbhseach impídmh ort!
Fand.eng0:
Black Molly: Oh vast, terrible ocean
 I entreet upon you!
Fand.gae1:
Seachain, Mallaidh Dubh,
ná glaoigh ar an farraige go baoth
Fand.eng1:
Beware, Black Molly,
Mac Lír's aid is not to be sought lightly
Fand.gae2: Ach ná bí búrtha, a chroí.
Fand.gae3:
Fand:
Fiú nach ach duine mé, seasfaidh mé leat.
Fand.eng3:
Although I am but one,
 I shall stand with you.
Fand.gae4: Tá dóchas ann! Lean ar aghaidh, Fand na dáimhe.
Fand.eng4:
Black Molly:
then there is hope! Lead on, o muse.
Fand.eng5:
Fand:
Let us choose our champion...
